Classes.Balls

Class PulsatingBall

  • java.lang.Object
    • Classes.Ball
      • Classes.Balls.PulsatingBall

  • public class PulsatingBall
extends Ball
    The PulsatingBall class represents a billiard ball which pulsates (in size).

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lennart B

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a new ball which is pulsating (constantly changing size)

      Creates a new ball which is pulsating (constantly changing size)

    • Constructor Detail

      • PulsatingBall

        public PulsatingBall(double size,
                     double[] pos,
                     double[] vel,
                     GameInformation gameInformation)

        Creates a new ball which is pulsating (constantly changing size)

        Parameters:
        size - The median diameter of the ball. The ball will pulsate between 0.5 and 1.5 times this size unless the min or max size is set separately.
        pos - The position of the ball
        {x,y}
        vel - The velocity of the ball
        {x,y}
        gameInformation - The GameInformation class containing all information of the current game

      • PulsatingBall

        public PulsatingBall(double size,
                     double[] pos,
                     GameInformation gameInformation)

        Creates a new ball which is pulsating (constantly changing size)

        Parameters:
        size - The median diameter of the ball. The ball will pulsate between 0.5 and 1.5 times this size unless the min or max size is set separately.
        pos - The position of the ball
        {x,y}
        gameInformation - The GameInformation class containing all information of the current game

      • PulsatingBall

        public PulsatingBall(double size,
                     double posX,
                     double posY,
                     GameInformation gameInformation)

        Creates a new ball which is pulsating (constantly changing size)

        Parameters:
        size - The diameter of the ball
        posX - The X-position of the ball
        posY - The Y-position of the ball
        gameInformation - The GameInformation class containing all information of the current game

      • update

        public void update(double deltaTime)

        Updates the balls position and size
        This should be called every frame in order for the Ball to move

        Overrides:
        update in class Ball
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - The time that passed since the last update in seconds
